alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Teton (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 8:40PM MDT until July 07 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Teton County in north central Montana... Northwestern Cascade County in central Montana... * Until 930 PM MDT. * At 839 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fort Shaw, or 22 miles southeast of Choteau, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Power. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
